text: Behold, here I am: witness against me before the LORD, and before his anointed: whose ox have I taken? or whose ass have I taken? or whom have I defrauded? whom have I oppressed? or of whose hand have I received any bribe to blind mine eyes therewith? and I will restore it you.12.3 bribe: Heb. ransom12.3 to blindâ€¦: or, that I should hide mine eyes at him
